pages.title: Water
pages.text: Water can be found in the Ocean ecosystem, or in smaller lakes in most ecosystems.$(br2)Early on you can transport it around with $(l:sim_1/2_sifting#bottles)Bottles.$()

pages.title: Lava
pages.text: Most commonly found deep underground. Sometimes found on the surface in small lakes.$(br2)Hard to transport because of it's temperature.
